column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services express sympathy condolences photos dylan mark jennerjohn and evelynn marie jennerjohn, children of dylan jennerjohn and mercedes ploor, were born on june 8, 2015, and passed away the same day. survivors include: their parents, maternal grandparents, jill cornette (jerry kaye), brussels; and bill ploor, sturgeon bay; paternal grandparents, mark and tina jennerjohn, sturgeon bay; maternal great-grandparents, ervin and clarice cornette, sturgeon bay; paternal great-grandparents, ed and arlene fager, sturgeon bay; and don and rosemarie jennerjohn, sturgeon bay; aunts, uncles, and cousins. private family services will be conducted at holy name of mary cemetery in maplewood. the forbes funeral home is in charge of arrangements. click to send flowers using our local area florist free delivery to our funeral home & save on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. send chocolates. express your condolences by sending a beautiful selection of chocolates, handcrafted in the usa. browse selection. veteran flag cases. we are proud to offer the finest heirloom-quality products to the families of our nation's veterans. browse products. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. cheryl simon posted wed june 10, 2015 i would like to extend my deepest condolences to the family. loosing a child is against the natural order of things. loosing twins at birth makes this doubly difficult. there are no words that can possibly say the right thing. when you are sad, be assured that death cannot take away your love, it will only continue to grow. time and distance cannot erase your love and your bond. when you are feeling far away, close your eyes and feel the soft brush of angel wings. know that as you go day to day, they are never far away. may god bless you and give you peace and comfort during this most difficult time. you will be kept in my thoughts and prayers. add condolence
